General.Name: PPI Inc
General.Description: PPI Inc. produces and sells optical power splitters and arrayed waveguide gratings for use in high speed and FTTH networks. Its products include planar lightwave circuits (PLC) splitter chips and power splitter modules, mode conversion adapters, arrayed waveguide gratings, variable optical attenuators, optical switches, optical power meters, and optical network eye systems. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Gwangju, South Korea.
